img_summary: The image depicts the "Bronze Cloud Staff," a weapon featured in the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. It is part of a guide detailing various weapons, their stats, effects, and acquisition methods. This specific weapon has 36 damage, a 2% critical hit chance, and is exclusive to the Deluxe Edition, obtainable at the "Front Hills" Shrine in the Forest of Wolves. The staff is not craftable.
